document.full_text: a california lawmaker has joined a growing cadre of west coast politicians calling for more scrutiny from the top u.s. nuclear regulator in response to the situation at japan's fukushima plant.
document.title: california lawmaker joins calls for nuclear reviews
lines_and_colors: a california lawmaker has joined a growing cadre of west coast politicians calling for more scrutiny from the top u.s. nuclear regulator in response to the situation at japan's fukushima plant.
